prompt.description: The text description of the scene, subject, or action to generate in the video.

image_url.description:
A URL or a Base64-encoded image file used as the initial frame for video generation.
The image dimensions must match the selected video resolution and aspect ratio.
Supported configurations include:
720p with aspect ratios:
- 16:9 — 1280x720
- 9:16 — 720x1280

1080p with aspect ratios:
- 16:9 — 1792x1024
- 9:16 — 1024x1792

resolution.description: The resolution of the output video, where the number refers to the short side in pixels.

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video.

duration.description: The length of the output video in seconds.

id.description: The ID of the generated video.

status.description: The current status of the generation task.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

error.description: Description of the error, if any.

credits_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v2/video/generations' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
      "model": "openai/sora-2-i2v",
      "prompt": "A woman looks into the camera, breathes in, then exclaims energetically, ’Hello world!’",
      "image_url": "https://s2-111386.kwimgs.com/bs2/mmu-aiplatform-temp/kling/20240620/1.jpeg"
    }'
